Class Spring

java.lang.Object
  jgame.JGObject
      jboxGlue.PhysicalObject

              object.Spring
Direct Known Subclasses:
Muscle
public class Spring
extends PhysicalObjectRect

Spring object that behaves accordingly to Hooke's law F=-kx

Author:
Yuhua Mai, Susan Zhang

Parameters:
id - object ID
collisionId - object collision ID
color - color of spring
mass1 - first Mass object that is attached to spring
mass2 - second Mass object that is attached to spring
length - rest length
k - spring constant
